ml:created.ml:description:
This self-paced tutorial teaches you about MarkLogic Semantics. By the end of this tutorial, you should be able to:
Describe Semantic data, triples and triple store
Create a MarkLogic database to use as a triple store
Create Semantic indexes
Load RDF data into the MarkLogic triple store using MarkLogic Content Pump
Test the triple store database via a REST api
Query triples using SPARQL
Query triples using XQuery
